recommended_degree: Administrasi, Manajemen Administrasi, Sastra Cina, Bahasa Mandarin (Sarjana)
job_description:
This position are required to : 
 - Have a strong skill in English (spoken and written)
 - Willing to be placed in various projects in Indonesia

Scoope of duties: 
-  Assist to provide administrative support to project teams to ensure smooth execution.
- Assist in arranging business trips including employee accommodation and transportation
- Supporting the smooth running of daily project operations.
- Assist to collect and verify reimbursement or payment invoices and coordinate with the head office.
- Coordinate with internal departments for signatures, approvals, or follow-ups
- Help make purchases for projects such as: stationery, etc.
- Support the Project Manager in administrative activities such as scheduling meetings and preparing project checklists, agreement, etc.
